column2: Lethargic and slightly hunched. No primary visible upon initial inspection, but one was found between shoulders during necropsy.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Skull was very soft and before being opened there appeared to be a lot of blood in the brain.
Brain was also soft and didn't come out cleanly (small piece got left in skull)
No cell line or tumor chunks frozen
One large yellow/white nodule on one of the lungs and some smaller black nodules dispersed across lungs.
